function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with mask-wearing, handwashing, and social distancing measures","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, enforcement of guidelines, and penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology to monitor gatherings","People":"General public, high-risk individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Varying levels of government response stringency index (GRSI) across countries and states","Impact":"Inconsistent implementation of mitigation measures leading to uneven control of disease spread","Mitigation":"International collaboration on standards, sharing best practices, and coordination of response efforts","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring and evaluating response measures, international communication platforms","People":"Government officials, policymakers, public health organizations","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of modified stringency indices for U.S. states (BSI)","Impact":"Potential for confusion and lack of uniformity in evaluating and comparing state responses","Mitigation":"Clear communication of methodology, transparency in data reporting, and standardized benchmarks for comparison","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, public health information systems, online dashboards for reporting","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers, state officials","Owner":"Public health research organizations, government agencies"}]}
